name: 高淩菁
objective: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
schedule:
週次	日期	課程大綱進度
1	2/18	Ch 8. Confidence Interval Estimation
2	2/25	Ch 8. Confidence Interval Estimation
3	3/4	Ch 9. Fundamentals of Hypothesis Testing:
                One-Sample Tests
4	3/11	Ch 9. Fundamentals of Hypothesis Testing: 
                One-Sample Tests
5	3/18	Exam 1
6	3/25	Ch 10. Two-Sample Tests
7	4/1	Ch 11. Analysis of Variance
8	4/8	Ch 11. Analysis of Variance
9	4/15	Ch 12. Chi-Square Tests and Nonparametric Tests
10	4/22	Ch 12. Chi-Square Tests and Nonparametric Tests
11	4/29	Exam 2
12	5/6	Ch 13. Simple Linear Regression
13	5/13	Ch 13. Simple Linear Regression
14	5/20	Ch 14. Introduction to Multiple Regression
15	5/27	Ch 14. Introduction to Multiple Regression
16	6/3	Ch 15. Time-Series Forecasting
17	6/10	Ch 15. Time-Series Forecasting
18	6/17	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
In-class quiz: 25% 	
Homework: 15%	
Exam 1: 20%	
Exam 2: 20%	
Final Exam: 20%
materials:
Textbook: 
Basic Business Statistics: Concept and Applications, by Berenson, Levine, and Krehbiel, 12th Edition
